arts.ttl: Belarus vs Scotland live: Steve Clarke’s side hoping for their first win in World Cup qualifying
arts.sum: Can Scotland notch their first win of World Cup qualifying?

Scotland are set to take on a struggling Belarus side in Group C, aiming for their first win after a 0-0 draw with Denmark. Belarus have lost 12 of their last 13 World Cup qualifiers, conceding 27 g...

arts.ttl: Belarus vs Scotland – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Scotland face Belarus in World Cup qualification on Monday evening, aiming to build on a solid start. Steve Clarke’s side held Denmark to a goalless draw in their opener, ahead of facing a Belarus team who were hammered 5-1 by Greece. arts.ttl: Scotland XI vs Belarus – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Scotland prepare for their crucial World Cup qualifier against Belarus at the ZTE Arena on Monday evening. Belarus host Scotland in the neutral territory of Hungary, looking to bounce back from a devastating 5-1 defeat to Greece in their opening qualifying fixture. arts.ttl: Why will Scotland be playing Belarus in Hungary?
arts.sum: Scotland's World Cup qualifier against Belarus on 8 September will take place at a neutral venue, but the Tartan Army will not be there to see it.

arts.ttl: Clarke expecting reaction from Belarus against Scotland
arts.sum: While some may feel there is an opportunity for goals, Clarke expects a “reaction” from Belarus and is focused on the three points. Steve Clarke will take any sort of victory over Belarus in Scotland ’s 2026 World Cup qualifier on Monday night.
